dashboard.label: Sensor Status
dashboard.description: Provides information on each Tango Sensor

search.query: index=honeypot | stats latest(_time) as Time, latest(sensorIP) as Sensor, latest(ASN) AS "ASN", latest(ASN_Country) AS "ASN Country", latest(description) AS "Network Name", latest(network_range) AS "Network Range" by host | rename host as "Sensor Name" | eval Time=strftime(Time, "%m/%d/%y %H:%M:%S") | rename Time as "Last Active" Sensor AS "Sensor IP Address" | sort - "Last Active"
index=honeypot | stats values(sensorIP) as Sensor by host | geoip Sensor | geostats latfield=Sensor_latitude longfield=Sensor_longitude count by Sensor
